output.sentences: The Halloween party featured a costume contest and dance-off.
One guy's costume was a bunch of temporary tats on his back, which was kind of lame.
One male and female took the occasion to dress as office workers, super boring.
Some of the costumes were dope and scarey, like this guy dressed as a skeleton.
We played a fun game, where we turned out the lights and robbed candy from each other.
